TopicTitle: Guys ... I haven't slept in 4 days

Articles.Content:
This game is just .......

I'm so hooked. I've played over 180 hours in the last three days. I'm not sure how, but it's true. Every night my brain goes over rocket designs and delta V calculations and all the possibilities of cool stuff I can make. I wake up in the am and play until I go to bed. I need an intervention.

This game is just .......

I'm so hooked. I've played over 180 hours in the last three days. I'm not sure how, but it's true. Every night my brain goes over rocket designs and delta V calculations and all the possibilities of cool stuff I can make. I wake up in the am and play until I go to bed. I need an intervention.

You better be careful, don't want to get burned out before the ARM patch and the 0.24 update!
Do we need to do an intervention with you?

I've played over 180 hours in the last three days.

Must be nice, being able to alter time.

Unless you and your PC were travelling at a speed close to C than most likely you haven't played 180hrs in 3 days. That's IF you weren't under the effects relativistic time dilation...if!

Get some sleep, KSP will be there when you wake. Plus, ya will design more effective crafts and missions when well-rested. =]

Must be nice, being able to alter time.

maybe he means that is in-game time

I have to agree with you. Every morning before going to school the first thing I did was play KSP. And during school my mind only thinks about what to do next, what I'm going to build, which planet I'm going to land on and it goes on. And also the first thing I did after reaching home was play KSP. XD

Must be nice, being able to alter time.

He must be using the flux capacitor mod.

He must be using the flux capacitor mod.

I need one of those for my life... These kids with no job or responsibilities are depressing.

When you wake up in two days you can thank me. XD

and then i got the good version......NOOO SLEEP FOR WEEKS!

i feel ya brother.
I'm waiting 0.24 for play a lot time. You should wait for 0.24 before reach 200h

Too many ideas, not enough time.

And then .... and then .... and then there were MODS! GOODBYE SLEEP! My poor wife has realized that if she wants to spend any quality time, she brings her iPad into the computer room and watches TV while I KSP. I think she's developing a crush on Jebediah, though. She keeps calling him "My little buddy" and asking how he's doing.

My Eve mission almost stranded him, and she yelled at me. Actually yelled at me, "NO! YOU BRING MY LITTLE BUDDY HOME!" She still doesn't care about the game at all. But I think she found out the only way to communicate with me.
Know the feeling. No game since EVE has grabbed my attention like that.

KSP just has that certain intangible to it. It drives you to innovate, which leads to failure, which leads to you playing more, and that starts the cycle again. Its almost like the Just One More Turn mentality that you get from playing Civ!

Know the feeling. No game since EVE has grabbed my attention like that.

only thing you need to do in Eve is log in for 5 minutes every few days to add stuff to your training queue...

Most boring game I've ever played.
